name: Gone Dark
description:
You've detected a signal coming from a stellar dust cloud. Travel deeper and deeper into it to find  the source.

CONTROLS

WS - Throttle control
AD - Sideways movment
Space/Ctrl - Vertical Movement
R - Reset Throttle

F4/F11 - Toggle fullscreen

If your display isn't widescreen then you'll have to play in windowed.
You may have to toggle fullscreen if the sides seem cut off.
